changeSet.author: yuzhanfeng
yuzhanfeng
changeSet.sql:
-- d_taiwan.da_notice_send_log definition
CREATE TABLE `da_notice_send_log` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `message` text COMMENT '消息', `create_time` datetime DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '发送时间', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET = utf8mb4 COMMENT ='公告发送记录';

changeSet.author: yuzhanfeng
changeSet.sql:
-- d_taiwan.da_mail_send_log definition
CREATE TABLE `da_mail_send_log` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `send_details` text COMMENT '发送内容', `create_time` datetime DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '发送时间', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET = utf8mb4 COMMENT ='邮件发送记录';

changeSet.author: yuzhanfeng
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE da_item MODIFY COLUMN name varchar(200) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NOT NULL COMMENT '名称';

changeSet.author: yuzhanfeng
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE da_game_config MODIFY COLUMN id bigint(20) auto_increment NOT NULL COMMENT 'id';

changeSet.author: yuzhanfeng
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO da_game_config (id, conf_name, conf_type, conf_data, conf_key, remark) VALUES(1, '主线任务完成券', 1, '114154', 'complete_task_id', '主线任务完成券的道具id'); INSERT INTO da_game_config (id, conf_name, conf_type, conf_data, conf_key, remark) VALUES(2, '强化增幅必成等级', 1, '15', 'upgrade_success_level', '强化或增幅等级多少以下不失败');

changeSet.author: yuzhanfeng
changeSet.sql: UPDATE da_game_config SET conf_name='主线任务完成券', conf_type=1, conf_data='8070', conf_key='complete_task_item_id', remark='一键完成主线任务的道具id' WHERE id=1; UPDATE da_game_config SET conf_name='强化增幅必成等级', conf_type=1, conf_data='30', conf_key='upgrade_success_level', remark='强化或增幅多少级不失败' WHERE id=2;

changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE da_frida_function ADD function_key varchar(64) NOT NULL COMMENT '函数唯一标识'; ALTER TABLE da_frida_function ADD CONSTRAINT da_frida_function_UN UNIQUE KEY (function_key);

changeSet.author: yuzhanfeng
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE da_frida_function ADD is_system_fun tinyint(1) DEFAULT 0 NULL COMMENT '系统函数';
